item.title: How to get the complete and exact list of mounted filesystems in Linux?
item.description: findmnt -lo source,target,fstype,label,options,used -t xfs SOURCE TARGET FSTYPE LABEL OPTIONS /dev/vda1 / xfs rw,relatime,attr2,inode64,noquota /proc/mounts /etc/mtab
